section.heading: Contracting authority.
section.text: The Mayor may select 1 or more contractors to provide services as may be part of the defined contribution plan under § 1-626.05(3). Any contract under § 1-626.05(2) and (3) shall be in accordance with the provisions of Chapter 3 of Title 2.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 1987, D.C. Law 7-27, § 2(g), 34 DCR 5079

annoGroup.heading: Mayor's Orders
annoGroup.annotation: Establishment of Pension Benefit Committee: See Mayor’s Order 89-235, October 5, 1989.
